New Records: David Warner scored 163 runs, the highest individual score in the match.
Shaheen Afridi took 5-54, the best bowling figures in the match.
Key Match Events: David Warner scored a century despite a groin problem.
Pakistan collapsed from 287-8 to 305, losing 6 wickets for 18 runs.
Australia won by 62 runs, their second consecutive win in the World Cup.
Pre-Game Insights: Pat Cummins emphasized Australia's focus on taking the game on and staying aggressive.
Babar Azam highlighted Pakistan's need to improve their powerplay performance.
Post-Match Reflections: Pat Cummins expressed satisfaction with the team's performance and praised the openers for setting the tone.
Babar Azam admitted Pakistan's shortcomings in the match and vowed to improve.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the M.Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bangalore, with Australia winning by 62 runs.
Australia and Pakistan are level on points with South Africa in the group stage.
